content: Figure 2.  Direct Links between LISCC Banks and Global CCPs       Note:  The figure illustrates the network between banks in the portfolio of the Large Institution Supervision Coordinating Committee (LISCC), represented by blue circles, and   central counterparties (CCPs), represented by red circles.  Each connection indicates the relationship between a member bank and the CCP.     Source:  Federal Reserve Board.
